front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks-Bridges and Bridged Networks Asynchronous Traffic Shaping

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2014 specifies procedures and managed objects for a bridge to perform asynchronous traffic shaping over full-duplex links with constant bit data rates.
